titles: Suspiria, or Sighs on the death of the late Most Illustrious Monarch Charles the II. King of Great Britain, France and Ireland, &c. who changed his earthly for a heavenly crown, on Fryday the 6th. of February 1684/5. in the 37th year of his reign, and 55th of his age.
notes: Verse: "Can Great, Illustrious Britains Monarch, Dye ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
